abstract: YouTube says it is introducing service that will automatically place shopping ads on videos that will redirect viewers directly to retailer websites; is part of effort to capitalize on rapid growth of video product reviews and tutorials.
lead_paragraph: The new service would place product ads on any video on the site, like product reviews uploaded by amateur reviewers, provided the clip’s owner opts in.

headline.main: YouTube to Expand Shopping Links to More Videos
headline.print_headline: YouTube to Expand Retail Links on Videos

snippet: The new service would place product ads on any video on the site, like product reviews uploaded by amateur reviewers, provided the clip’s owner opts in.
